content.text:
# List of archaeological sites of the Taklamakan and Lop Desert

This list is of the archaeological sites of the Taklamakan Desert and Lop Desert in China.
Sites

!width="10%" align="left" class="unsortable"| Coordinates

| align="center" | Achik-ilek
|| Kuqa County
|| Xinjiang
|| In the vicinity of ancient Kucha. Exact location unclear. [http://idp.bl.uk/database/oo_loader.a4d?pm=Kucha Images of the site on the IDP project]. There are two Lion sculptures recovered from the site by the German Turfan expeditions. Images are viewable here: [http://slides-www.ucsc.edu/dbms.acgi$detail?232159 Right-looking Lion sculpture] [http://slides-www.ucsc.edu/dbms.acgi$detail?232158 Left-looking Lion sculpture]
